dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: Beware, intruder. What business do you have in these cursed ruins?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek only power and dominance.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Power and dominance, the blinding desires of mortals. You tread a dangerous path, for the shadows hold their own kind of power.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: The shadows are of no concern to me. I will conquer all in my path.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: So be it. Your arrogance blinds you to the true essence of darkness. Prepare for a confrontation.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I fear no darkness. Let our paths collide in battle.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your bravado is futile. The shadows will consume you. May our clash bring clarity to your misguided soul.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I see wisdom in retreat. Our paths need not intertwine today.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your moment of cowardice seals your fate. Begone, and do not return to these ruins.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am open to learning. Share your knowledge of the shadows with me.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Curiosity in the face of darkness. An intriguing trait, though your thirst for knowledge may lead to your downfall.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I embrace the darkness and all its secrets. Teach me, shadow guardian.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge is power, but in the wrong hands, it is a weapon. Very well, I shall impart a fragment of shadow-touched wisdom unto you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Knowledge comes with a price. Perhaps it's best I leave the shadows to their own devices.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wise choice. Ignorance can be bliss in a world consumed by darkness. Leave these ruins and tread cautiously.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek redemption from the shadows. Is there a path to light within these ruins?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Redemption, a rare desire among those who walk the shadows. The path to light is twisted and perilous, yet not impossible to find.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will follow the path to light, no matter the trials. Guide me, shadowed one.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: An unexpected choice, but one that may lead to unexpected outcomes. Proceed cautiously, for the light can be blinding in the depths of darkness.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: The shadows have consumed me. There is no redemption. Farewell, guardian of darkness.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: So be it. May the shadows claim you wholly, and may your absence bring silence to these accursed ruins.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am but a traveler seeking passage through these ruins.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Traveler or intruder, the shadows make no distinction. Your presence here raises suspicion. State your true purpose.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: My purpose is my own, veiled in shadows. I mean no harm to these ruins or their guardians.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A cryptic response, traveler. Your words hold an air of deception. Your intentions shall be revealed through the trials ahead.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have no desire for confrontation. I seek only passage unhindered.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Passage unhindered, such a noble request. Yet the shadows demand a toll. Pay it, and you may pass through.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: If trials await, so be it. I will face them with unwavering resolve.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Resolve alone may not be enough to sway the shadows. Your words ring hollow. Prepare for what lies ahead.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am lost and seek guidance out of these ruins. Can you assist me?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Lost souls are common in these ruins, but not all find a way out. Guidance comes at a cost. Are you willing to pay?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will pay any price for safe passage. Lead the way, guardian of shadows.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A bold choice, traveler. Your trust in shadows may be your downfall, or perhaps your salvation. Follow, and the path may reveal itself.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: My path is mine to find. I will rely on my own instincts to navigate these ruins.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Independence, a trait both admirable and foolish in this forsaken place. Forge your own path, traveler, and face the consequences.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek no trouble. My presence here is a mere coincidence. I will depart as swiftly as I came.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Coincidence in the shadows is a rare occurrence, traveler. Depart swiftly if you wish to evade the darkness that lingers.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I heed your warning and take my leave. May the shadows grant you peace, guardian.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your departure brings a temporary calm to these ruins. May you find your path elsewhere, away from the shadows that whisper malice.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I sense the shadows' hostility. If trouble is what they seek, then trouble they shall find.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Hostility begets hostility, traveler. Your defiance may lead to unintended consequences. The shadows hunger for conflict.
